void HttpBody::setBody (  const SharedBuffer &  buf  ) 
 

Sets the contents of the body to the binary content in buf.

Sets the binary flag to true.

Parameters:
buf is the new bodycontent, copied into the HttpBody. Same as setBody buf.getBufferAddress(), buf.getBufferSize()
